title: Elle Fanning wears ball gown at Maleficent: Mistress Of Evil premiere
text:
She stars as Princess Aurora in the sequel Maleficent: Mistress Of Evil.

And Elle Fanning looked ethereal as she took to the red carpet in a pale green ballgown for the star-studded premiere held at IMAX Waterloo in London on Wednesday.

The actress, 21, exuded glamour in the strapless floor length dress, which came complete with delicate mesh detailing and fluted sleeves.

Princess: Elle Fanning looked ethereal as she took to the red carpet in a pale green ballgown for the star-studded Maleficent: Mistess of Evil premiere in London on Wednesday

The strapless number cinched in her tiny waist and boasted a stunning pearl overlay complete with gorgeous ruffle detailing down the sleeves.

The actress oozed glamour as she posed away on the red carpet with her blonde locks styled into a slick bun, giving way to her dangling silver earrings.

Elle made the most of her doll-like features with a simple slick of rosy blusher, black eyeliner and silver eyeshadow.

Stunning: The actress, 21, exuded glamour in the strapless floor length dress, which came complete with delicate mesh detailing and fluted sleeves

Ethereal: The strapless number cinched in her tiny waist and boasted a stunning pearl overlay complete with gorgeous ruffle detailing down the sleeves

Gorgeous: The actress oozed glamour as she posed away on the red carpet with her blonde locks styled into a slick bun, giving way to her dangling silver earrings

Turning heads: Elle made the most of her doll-like features with a simple slick of rosy blusher, black eyeliner and silver eyeshadow

The star, who is the younger sister of Dakota Fanning, 25, proved to be on par with Angelina as they joined forces to pose away on the red carpet.

Disney beginners may not recall Maleficent is the evil fairy in the classic 1959 animation Sleeping Beauty, and that Angelina played her in a 2014 live-action film.

Just five years on, Jolie is playing her again in Mistress Of Evil, still wearing black horns, fighting fairies and sorting out her conflicted maternal feelings towards sweet Princess Aurora (Fanning).

This time she has competition from the neighbouring Queen Ingrith (Michelle Pfeiffer) who causes a rift between our anti-heroine and Aurora, when her son Prince Phillip returns to the kingdom and proposes to the Princess.

Princess and villain: The star, who is the younger sister of Dakota Fanning, 25, proved to be on par with Angelina (right) as they joined forces to pose away on the red carpet

Leading ladies: Angelina complemented Elle's dress. The actress looked incredible in a silver beaded chiffon gown

Wow factor: The leading ladies put on a dazzling display as they reunited on the red carpet

Unbeknown to Aurora, Ingrith is plotting to use their marriage to divide humans and fairies forever, and it is up to Maleficent to try and stop the impending war.

Chiwetel Ejiofor joins the cast as the leader of an army of fairies just like Maleficent, while Harris will replace Brenton Thwaites as Prince Phillip.

The original 2014 film grossed a whopping $758million worldwide, and brought another success addition to Disney's series of dark fairy tales.

The dark side: Disney beginners may not recall that Maleficent is the evil fairy in the classic 1959 animation Sleeping Beauty, and that Angelina played her in a 2014 live-action film
description: Elle Fanning looked ethereal as she took to the red carpet in a pale green ballgown for the star-studded Maleficent: Mistess of Evil premiere  in London on Wednesday.
